On Monday 09 June 2008 06:23, Phil Surette wrote:
> I'd like to make a case for adding logging of assertions into junit.

Actually, to me this defeats the purpose of JUnit.
I want a simple green or red result. 
If I have to go through umpteen thousand lines of log, I may as well test 
everything manually.

Robert
